actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: For the relief of Arturo Aguirre-Alvarado, his wife, Soledad Labra de Aguiree, and their children Graciela Aguirre Labra, Guadalupe Aguirre Labra, Alma Rosa Aguirre Labra, Arturo Aguirre Labra, Junior, Alberto Aguirre Labra and Beatriz Aguirre Labra.
